source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
SchoolId AS AGEID,
c.SchoolNameAndArea,
cy.year AS Year,
CAST(SUBSTRING(st.SchoolTermDesc, CHARINDEX(' ', st.SchoolTermDesc) + 1) AS INT) AS Semester
--st.SchoolTermDesc AS Semester,
yl.YearLevelSifDesc AS YearLevel,
student.Ceider,
sub.SubjectShortName AS [Subject],
v.ResultValue,
a.SubjectCode AS SubjectCode,
a.ActivityName AS [ClassCode],
--gi.GradingItem,
--m.Name AS ResultType,

FROM  
dbo.vwDMFactSemesterReporting f
JOIN dbo.vwDMCampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
JOIN dbo.vwDMSchoolTerm st ON f.SKSchoolSemester = st.SKSchoolTerm
JOIN dbo.vwDMPersonDemographic student ON f.SKStudent = student.SKPerson
JOIN dbo.vwDMPersonDemographic staff ON f.SKStaff = staff.SKPerson
JOIN dbo.vwDMYearLevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
JOIN dbo.vwDMCalendarYear cy ON f.SKReportingYear = cy.SkYear
JOIN dbo.vwDMRollGroup rg ON f.SKRollGroup = rg.SKRollGroup
JOIN dbo.vwDMGender g ON f.SKGenderId = g.SKGenderId
JOIN dbo.vwDMSemesterReportSubject sub ON f.SKSemesterReportSubject = sub.SKSemesterReportSubject
JOIN dbo.vwDMSemesterReportActivity a ON f.SKSemesterReportActivity = a.SKSemesterReportActivity
JOIN dbo.vwDMSemesterReportGradingItem gi ON f.SKSemesterReportGradingItem = gi.SKSemesterReportGradingItem
JOIN dbo.vwDMSemesterReportResultValue v ON f.SKSemesterReportResultValue = v.SKSemesterReportResultValue
JOIN dbo.vwDMSemesterReportMeasure m ON f.SKSemesterReportMeasure = m.SKSemesterReportMeasure

WHERE 1=1
AND (m.Name = 'QLD Overall Result' 
        OR m.Name = '3afc1a3d-5928-4c95-b3e3-f1857cc252bd'
        OR m.Name = 'e2b5b1bd-168b-4b8c-812d-fa73abb31035'
        OR m.Name = '1edbc1d1-3d1d-4234-a27f-1dfc62b469fc' )

ORDER BY
ageid,
ReportingYear,
Semester,
YearLevel,
Ceider,
Subject,
gi.GradingItem
